bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a communicable disease acquired through sexual intercourse by persons who had been cured of harm caused by cold only shortly before. Shang han lun 傷寒論 392: “ 傷寒 陰陽易之為病，其人身體重、少氣、少腹裏急 , “In the case of the disease of harm caused by cold with yin and yang exchange , the respective person feels as if his body were heavy. He is short of qi, and there is tension inside his abdomen”.
